Homemade perfume with cadaverine, putrescene and a solvent :D

I know your product is probably very impure, but do you think trying to generate the hydrochloride salt, for example, would be a good way to isolate / purify your compound. It would also quench the strong smell of the compound.

My guess is that an anhydrous solution of HCl in acetone or isopropanol would be good for this purpose. I'm sure you could easily make such a solution with what you have at you disposal. However, be aware that anhydrous HCl is sometimes used in production of illicit substances.

Anyway, this is just a suggestion. I myself have never tried a similar purification.

Keep up the good work!
